title: Ready for it
lyrics: Hợp âm chia ở Tone   Knew he was a killer Wonder how many girls he had loved and left haunted But if he's a ghost then I can be a phantom Holdin' him for ransom Some, some boys are tryin' too hard Younger than my exes but he act like such a man, so I see nothing better, I keep him forever Like a ven- detta-ta I-I-I see how this is gonna go Touch me, and you'll never be alone I-Island breeze and lights down low No one has to know In the middle of the night, in my dreams You should see the things we do, ba- by In the middle of the night in my dreams I know I'm gonna be with you So I take my time  Me, I was a robber Stealing hearts and running off and never saying sorry But if I'm a thief then And we'll move to an island-and He can be my jailer Every lover known in comparison is a failure I forget their names now Never be the same now, now I-I-I see how this is gonna go Touch me, and you'll never be alone I-Island breeze and lights down low No one has to know In the middle of the night, in my dreams You should see the things we do, ba- by In the middle of the night in my dreams I know I'm gonna be with you So I take my time  Baby, let the games be- gin Let the games be- gin Let the games be- gin I-I-I see how this is gonna go Touch me, and you'll never be alone I-Island breeze and lights down low No one has to know In the middle of the night, in my dreams ( my dreams) You should see the things we do, ba- by ( we do, baby) In the middle of the night in my dreams ( my dreams) I know I'm gonna be with you So I take my time (in the mddle of the...) Baby, let the games be- gin Let the games be- gin
